parameters.label: Main Cam Zoom
parameters.infoText: How far the main game camera should zoom in. Leave at 0 to use the default zoom level.

parameters.label: Hud Cam Zoom
parameters.infoText: How far the hud camera should zoom in. Leave at 0 to use the default zoom level.

parameters.label: Time Multiplier
parameters.infoText: How fast the cameras should return to their default zoom levels. The higher this number is, the longer it will take.

parameters.label: Mode
parameters.infoText: Whether the values should be the exact zoom, or multiplied by the default zoom amount.
